com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui
Class PasscodeActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.salesforce.androidsdk.ui.PasscodeActivity

public class PasscodeActivity
extends Activity

Passcode activity: takes care of creating/verifying a user passcode.
